SELECT StoreID, SUM (TotalAmount) AS TotalAmount, SUM (SaleCost) AS SaleCost, sum(TotalAmount - SaleCost) as sumProfit FROM RPT_Base0006B WHERE 1 = 1 AND RunDate >= #{date} AND ( StoreID = '118' OR StoreID = '106' OR ( StoreID != '118' AND StoreID != '106' AND LEFT (KindCode, 2) != '14' ) ) -- AND LEFT(KindCode,2) != '14'
and TotalAmount !=0 and SaleCost !=0 GROUP BY storeID
